mutants.code:
def convert_punctuation_to_text(text):
    text = text.replace('', ' period')
    text = text.replace(',', ' comma')
    text = text.replace('!', ' exclamation')
    text = text.replace('?', ' question')
    return text

def convert_punctuation_to_text(text):
    text = text.replace('.', '')
    text = text.replace(',', ' comma')
    text = text.replace('!', ' exclamation')
    text = text.replace('?', ' question')
    return text
